Text.val: Changes passowrd in CUSR. This is not a trivial task because the password history also has to be kept and the passwords
need to be salted before encypted and stored in DB (CUSR).
27.08.2014 AS SCR#19068 Calling CV2 version of ICA919 now
06.08.2014 AS SCR#19052 rolled back change from 05.08, see SCRs for details
05.08.2014 AS SCR#19052 Unblock account if password is changed
14.11.2013 AS SCR#18520 Setting CUSR_NUMBERLOGINFAILURES=0 if a new password has been written to CUSR
change password to new value (+ salt it, +encrypt it, + keep history, ...)
Enforce a password change by the user in Creditview
when CUSR_PWDATE==NULL, the user is redirected to password change screen when logging in
